jd: Hello,Trust this e-mail finds you in good cheer!!I'm Rupender from SiriInfo. I have an opportunity with me you might be interested, please review the Job specifications below and let me know if you may be interested in this opening or may refer someone to me for this.For you reference, please find Job Description as underJob Title – Analyst- Data GovernanceLocation – San Antonio, TX/ Plano, TX (Onsite)Duration – 12+ Months Contract JOB DESCRIPTION:Understand the Hub-Spoke D&A setup of the business Working closely with Customers to migrate the Data Quality and Catalog components to SaaS / Data observability solution Metadata management activities and business rules to perform data quality validation Document / Creation of Wiki pages for understanding the Data Management migration process / roadmap Bi-weekly stakeholder updates on status of work and delivery timelines Having strong Analytical skills, logical reasoning, and good communication skillsExperience working in Information Management Data Governance & Data Quality. Hands on experience in Date Governance product such as IBM InfoSphere (IGC, IA), Alation, BigEye. Strong in SQL, Microsoft Excel; Working knowledge on SNOW Familiarity in Alation and BigEye Possess Analytical ability and problem-solving skills to analyze and interpret data Excellent communication (written and oral) and Articulation skills Understand Information management and Data Quality concepts as per DAMA standards
